events.body: The Red Badger tech team talk about how Node powered the new BBC Now homepage pilot.

events.title: ReactEurope 2016
events.strapline: Red Badger are super excited to be sponsoring ReactEurope for the second year running!

externalLinks.title: For more information please visit the conference page

events.body: The conference aims to give talks that inspire and explore new futuristic ideas dealing with all the techs we enjoy. ReactEurope is also a great occasion to socialise, hack together, taste delicious food and have fun in the beautiful city of Paris.
